message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a unique opportunity to own a one-of-a-kind item that will surely bring value to your life. I'm willing to sell it to you for $11,000. This is a great deal, considering its worth $12,000 to you. What do you think?

Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you're placing on the product. However, I'm looking to spend a bit less. How about $10,500? This would allow me to stay within my budget while still getting a good deal.

I understand that you're looking to stay within your budget, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $10,500. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $10,800. This is still a great deal, considering the product's worth $12,000 to you. What do you think?
